T11bsa020_u:3: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇam /
T11bsa020_u:4: yasya pramāṇaṃ na bhavetpramāṇaṃ kastasya kuryādvacanaṃ pramāṇam // Vs_2 //
T11bsa020_u:6: cakravākāḥ śaradvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // Vs_3 //
T11bsa020_u:7: te 'pi jātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ // Vs_4 //
T11bsa020_u:17: kaivartinyajanayad vyāsaṃ kuśikaṃ caiva śūdrikā // Vs_9 //
T11bsa020_u:18: viśvāmitraṃ ca caṇḍālī vasiṣṭhaṃ caiva urvaśī /
T11bsa020_u:19: na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇī mātā lokācārācca brāhmaṇāḥ // Vs_10 //
T11bsa020_u:20: sadyaḥ patati māṃsena lākṣayā lavaṇena ca /
T11bsa020_u:23: viprāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tato māṃsāni varjayet // Vs_12 //
T11bsa020_u:24: brāhmaṇatvaṃ na śāstreṇa na saṃskārairna jātibhiḥ /
T11bsa020_u:25: na kulena na vedena na karmaṇā bhavettataḥ // Vs_13 //
T11bsa020_u:28: satyaṃ brahma tapo brahma brahma cendriyanigrahaḥ /
T11bsa020_u:29: sarvabhūte dayā brahma etad brāhmaṇa lakṣaṇam // Vs_15 //
T11bsa020_u:30: satyaṃ nāsti tapo nāsti nāsti cendriyanigrahaḥ /
T11bsa020_u:33: maithunaṃ nādhigacchanti te viprāste ca brāhmaṇāḥ // Vs_17 //
T11bsa020_u:35: caṇḍālo 'pi hi tatrasthastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ // Vs_18 //
T11bsa020_u:39: jīvamāno bhavecchūdro mṛtaḥ śvānaśca jāyate // Vs_20 //
T11bsa020_u:57: tapasā tāpaso jāto brahmacaryeṇa brāhmaṇaḥ // Vs_28 //
T11bsa020_u:58: na ca te brāhmaṇīputrāste ca lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ /
T11bsa020_u:60: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ na kulaṃ pradhānaṃ kulena kiṃ śīlavivarjitena /
T11bsa020_u:61: bahavo narā nīcakula prasūtāḥ svargaṃ gatāḥ śīlamupetya dhīrāḥ // Vs_30 //
T11bsa020_u:63: urubhyāṃ vaiśyaḥ saṃjātaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdraka eva ca // Vs_31 //
T11bsa020_u:64: pāṇḍostu viśrutaḥ putraḥ sa vai nāmnā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
T11bsa020_u:66: ke ca te brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam /
T11bsa020_u:67: etadicchāmi bho jñātuṃ tad bhavān vyākaroti me // Vs_33 //
T11bsa020_u:69: na hanti sarvabhūtāni prathamaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam // Vs_34 //
T11bsa020_u:70: yadā sarvaṃ paradravyaṃ pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe /
T11bsa020_u:71: adattaṃ naiva gṛhṇāti dvitīyaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam // Vs_35 //
T11bsa020_u:73: muktaścarati yo nityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam // Vs_36 //
T11bsa020_u:75: maithunaṃ hi sadā tyaktaṃ caturthaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam // Vs_37 //
T11bsa020_u:77: sarvabhūta dayā śaucaṃ tapaḥ śaucañca pañcamam // Vs_38 //
T11bsa020_u:79: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāṃ śeṣāḥ śūdrā yudhiṣṭhira // Vs_39 //
T11bsa020_u:80: na kulena na jātyā vā kriyābhirbrāhmaṇo bhavet /
T11bsa020_u:81: caṇḍālo 'pi hi vṛtastho brāhmaṇaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira // Vs_40 //
T11bsa020_u:83: phalena na samarthaṃ ca brāhmaṇaḥ syādyudhiṣṭhira // Vs_40a //
T11bsa020_u:86: sarve vai yonijā martyāḥ sarve mūtrapurīṣiṇaḥ /
T11bsa020_u:93: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthe parārthe yasya jīvitam /
T11bsa020_u:94: ahorātraṃ caretkṣāntiṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ // Vs_45 //
T11bsa020_u:99: kṣamā dayā damo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ smṛtirghṛṇā /
T11bsa020_u:106: muktaścarati yo dharmaṃ tameva brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ // Vs_51 //
T11bsa020_u:107: yadā na kurute pāpaṃ sarvabhūteṣu dāruṇam /
T11bsa020_u:108: kāyena manasā vācā brahma sampadyate tadā // Vs_52 //
T11bsa020_u:109: asmābhiruktaṃ yadidaṃ dvijānāṃ mohaṃ nihantuṃ hatabuddhiṃkānām /
T11bsa020_u:110: gṛhmantu santo yadi yuktametanmuñcantvathāyuktamidaṃ yadi syāt // Vs_53 //
